DOC.brief_summary: To examine pharmacoeconomics IV acetaminophen ( Ofirmev ) . Specifically , examine potential improve hospital efficiency patient outcomes . The investigator compare addition IV acetaminophen versus placebo postoperative PACU recovery time , inpatient hospital length stay ( LOS ) , patient satisfaction score , postoperative pain score , consumption opiate rescue agent side effect , cost associate postoperative medication among patient undergo robotic-assisted laparoscopic prostatectomy ( RALP ) .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacoeconomics Related Patient Outcomes Multi-dose Intravenous Acetaminophen ( OFIRMEV )
